title: Beyond words: animal communication
creator_credit: Wolfgang Bayer, National Geographic Society and Wolfgang Bayer Productions
brief_description: Provides an overview of animals communicating for various reasons. Examples of calls and other communications amongst animals are then catalogued. Teachers guide included. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Wolfgang Bayer, National Geographic Society and Wolfgang Bayer Productions
